com.robopupu.api.mvp

Class PluginCompatActivity<T_Presenter extends Presenter>

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • com.robopupu.api.mvp.ViewCompatActivity<T_Presenter>
        • com.robopupu.api.mvp.PluginCompatActivity<T_Presenter>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scopeable, FeatureContainer, FeatureContainerProvider, FeatureTransitionManager, PresentedView<T_Presenter>, View, PluginComponent

    public abstract class PluginCompatActivity<T_Presenter extends Presenter>
extends ViewCompatActivity<T_Presenter>
implements FeatureContainer, FeatureContainerProvider, PluginComponent
    PluginCompatActivity extends ViewCompatActivity to provide an abstract base class for implementing Activity classes that utilise Robopupu.Plugin library.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        featureView - A FeatureView. May not be null.
        addToBackStack - A boolean value specifying if the FeatureView is added to back stack.
        fragmentTag - A tag for the Fragment. May be null.
